actions.description: The dust hulk makes three Slam attacks. It can replace one of these attacks with Stinging Dust.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: One creature of the dust hulk's choice inside its space must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and has the blinded condition until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage only.
actions.name: Stinging Dust

conditionImmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, restrained
name: Dust Hulk [BGG]

specialTraits.description: The dust hulk can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.
specialTraits.name: Air Form

specialTraits.description: When the dust hulk dies, it explodes in a burst of dust that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or have the blinded condition for 1 minute. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
specialTraits.name: Death Burst
